RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttributeList

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttributeList Class Reference

#include <xmlattributelist.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Read the XML file of the attribute categories list.

It uses TinyXML to deal with the file.

Definition at line 39 of file xmlattributelist.cpp.

bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::xmlAttributeList::loadDocument ( CurlFileToXml *  cgf  )  [private]

Loads the xml document or creates it if it does not exist.

It use the CurlFileToXml to get the document. If the document cannot be get this way, we log a warning message and set correctlyLoaded to false.

Parameters:
cgf A pointer to a valid CurlFileToXml instance.
Returns:
true if the xml document was correctly loaded
